metadata.name: (k)NIGHT_CLUB
metadata.description:
Since the creation of the universe 
Beings have questioned the source of energy that materializes reality 
How can we harness this ether?
The life energy of the world
How can we illuminate the tyranny imposed by the dark one 
It puzzled me so I had no choice but to ask someone wiser than myself 
Nor the plants or the rocks could remember. 
Even the rocks couldnâ€™t tell me. 
I continue my quest in search 
Of the ether 
The only known element 
That can defeat Lord Noctis once and for all. 
In hope to turns the tides of the war in favor of the light 
Uncovered a lost scribe 
Containing encrypted translations 
To forge magic Armour and weaponry 
Armor that can withstand temptation 
And swords that cut through darkness
As Noctis approaches a sense of fear surrounds the sky 
As I finally arrive  to the (k)NIGHTCLUB 
Where the code of honor is to protect creation 


To be a knight 
Even on the darkest days 

Sincerely (k)
